text: Jessie Flower (aka Michaela Jill Murphy, born August 18, 1994 in Indiana) is an American voice actress. She is most well known as the voice of Toph in the Nickelodeon animated television series Avatar: The Last Airbender. She also voiced the character Meng in the season one episode "The Fortuneteller" and Peggy in Random! Cartoons episode Tiffany. Jessie has been in several movies, including Meet the Robinsons, Over the Hedge, The Ant Bully, Finding Nemo, and Brother Bear 2. She has also worked in anime, providing the English dub for Nasse in the Anime Platinum End. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Jessie Flower - Official Website Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors
title: Jessie Flower
